name: Extreme Monster Truck Mummies Destruction
description:
A group of Monster trucks convoy has hit up the Egyptian desert in a battle to save the last human civilization from falling into the hands of zombies.

Help these Monster Trucks team win now!
Features:
- 4 monster trucks to choose from
- Endless running scene
- Cool and entertaining music
- Tap on the left to jump
- Tap on the right to shoot at zombies
- collect coins
- Game center
- Coin shop

Download this game now!
